<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Deceiver's Cloak](/Spells.aspx?ID=1877)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 384 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Mischief](/Lessons.aspx?ID=21)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

Your patron drapes a cloak of illusion about you, making you appear as another creature of the same body shape with roughly similar height and weight as yourself. This has the effects of 3rd-rank [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159).

---
**Heightened (6th)** You can appear as any creature of the same size, even with a completely different body shape.
name: Deceiver's Cloak
